actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To establish a Federal District Court of American Samoa.
short_title: Federal District Court of American Samoa Act of 2006
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Federal District Court of American Samoa Act of 2006 - Establishes for and within American Samoa a court of record to be known as the Federal District Court of American Samoa. Sets forth provisions respecting: (1) jurisdiction; (2) appointment of a judge, U.S. Attorney, and U.S. Marshal; and (3) rules of practice and procedure.

titles.title: Federal District Court of American Samoa Act of 2006
To establish a Federal District Court of American Samoa.
